Management"},{"name":"description","value":"
This story will contain everything about setting up the project and the mangement.
"},{"name":"created","value":"1478083564000"},{"name":"updated","value":"1479053378880"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"root"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"root"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"anonfreak"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Marco Kolb"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"Priority","value":["High"],"valueId":["High"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"State","value":["To Do"],"valueId":["To Do"],"color":{"bg":"#d8f7f3","fg":"#45818e"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"root","fullName":"root"}]},{"name":"Label","value":["Requirements"],"valueId":["Requirements"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[{"value":"management","cssClass":"c0"},{"value":"requirements","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"BESTP-2","entityId":"102-1","jiraId":"12298","field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"BESTP"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"2"},{"name":"summary","value":"Prepare user-management"},{"name":"description","value":"
The user-management includes signing and logging in to our Project. This means we have to develop the required UI on the client for visitors and the corresponding interfaces on the server. Moreover, this requires to think about a database structure for every feature on the UI.
Another feature for User-Management is editing the user-data. Therefore, we will implement that one right after the log-in, because the main application needs some more time.
"},{"name":"created","value":"1478244787000"},{"name":"updated","value":"1479053371760"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"root"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"root"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"anonfreak"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Marco Kolb"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"BESTP-9","type":"Subtask","role":"parent for"},{"value":"BESTP-10","type":"Subtask","role":"parent for"}]},{"name":"Priority","value":["Medium"],"valueId":["Medium"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"State","value":["To Do"],"valueId":["To Do"],"color":{"bg":"#d8f7f3","fg":"#45818e"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"root","fullName":"root"}]},{"name":"Sprints","value":["Unscheduled"],"valueId":["Unscheduled"],"color":null},{"name":"Estimation","value":["300"],"valueId":["1d1h"],"color":null},{"name":"Label","value":["Design"],"valueId":["Design"],"color":null},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"First sprint","id":"BestPlaces:First sprint"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[{"value":"design","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"BESTP-9","entityId":"102-7","jiraId":"12444","field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"BESTP"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"9"},{"name":"summary","value":"Create datastructure"},{"name":"description","value":"
